abstract: Carl C. Icahn asked Biogen Idec’s board to consider splitting the company into two separate entities, focused on neurology and cancer.
snippet: Carl C. Icahn asked Biogen Idec’s board to consider splitting the company into two separate entities, focused on neurology and cancer.
lead_paragraph: Carl C. Icahn asked Biogen Idec‘s board to consider splitting the company into two separate entities, focused on neurology and cancer.
